item.title: AC-DC Converter
item.author: fabianmolina@stanford.edu (Fabian Molina)
item.description: Project Description: For this project, I designed and built an AC-DC converter circuit that rectifies an AC signal and outputs a stable DC voltage. Using diodes, I created a rectifier to convert the AC input into a pulsating DC signal, which is then smoothed and stored in a capacitor.
